title: King's 'profound concern' as police consider Andrew claims over Epstein
description: Making his first intervention in the Epstein scandal, the King said he is ready to support the police in their inquiries.
content:
King Charles has made his first intervention in the latest round of revelations in the Epstein scandal, saying Buckingham Palace is ready to support the police as they consider allegations against his brother Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor.

title: T20 World Cup: India-Pakistan fixture to go ahead after government ends boycott call
description: Pakistan's fixture against rivals India at the T20 World Cup is set to go ahead as scheduled after the Pakistan government ends its order for a boycott.
content:
Pakistan's fixture against India at the T20 World Cup is set to go ahead as scheduled on Sunday after the Pakistan government ended its order for a boycott.
